attributes.action: Call for a public enquiry into government payments for untendered PPE contracts
attributes.additional_details: Because this is a complete waste of taxpayers money and the government need to be held to account
attributes.background: Investigate blatant cronyism and why  millions of pounds of taxpayers money has been wasted, where the companies who were referred by Tory politicians have 1 in 10 success rate, when non-referred companies have a 1 in 100 success rate and why contracts were not put out to tender.
